# image

**Instance Property**

The image to display alongside the menu element’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: UIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

Only the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/context] menu system supports the display of an image, and only when the app is running in iOS.

## Getting the element attributes

- **title**: The title of the menu element.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle to display alongside the menu element’s title.

items.description: The title of the menu element.
items.name: title

items.description: The subtitle to display alongside the menu element’s title.
items.name: subtitle

title: image
